channel.title: Moparscape Skilling Clan - Giveaways
channel.description:
[b][u]Skill(s) of the Week:[/u][/b] Fishing & Woodcutting
[b]Lets not forget, I never said this was the Mopar official skilling clan, I just said it was a skilling clan for Mopar. And be that I meant open for Moparscape users to join freely.[/b]
Note: This is a new skilling clan I have made for Moparscape users, I am well there are already several skilling clans in this board but I wanted to start my own clan fresh and we will be mostly f2p since I cba to buy members at the moment. In this clan I will be doing giveaways including finishing the giveaway I have already started on the thread that can be found here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,540997.0.html
In the new skilling clan I will be doing monthly giveaways of 5M (possibly 10m if we get enough supporters/members) for active members in the clan, my Runescape name that I will be using to lead this clan can be found below in the list of members and ranks.
F2P Skilling Home World: 38
Also, each week we will focus on 1-2 skills at a time and focus on only getting those skills up, the majority of members will be doing only this skills since we will be "grouping" them but you can go off and do your own.
[b]Leader:[/b]
Kal Juhi (me)
[b]Generals:[/b]
[b]Captains:[/b]
[b]Lieutenants:[/b]
[b]Recruits:[/b]
[b]Members:[/b]
[b]Supporters:[/b]
[b]Warning: There is a new tutorial that JaGex has released that constantly tells you to go pick up coins or complete a task, but here is a quick snippet to skip it.[/b]
As soon as you make your account go to your task tab and at the bottom of that click "Open Task List" in the right corner of this interface click "Options" you will see a button that says "Tutorial Is On" click it and you turned the tutorial off. Now when you logout and back in it will offer you a trial membership which Jagex now does because... well I dont know why, but if you accept this trial then you have to complete a 1-2 hour tutorial that you cannot evade once you have entered and you must then make a new account or complete the tutorial.
In this clan I will also be doing random events that will consist of group activities and random giveaways of cash piles and/or valuable items, I hope to see the clan grow and I'd love to see many members joining up!

item.title: Moparscape Skilling Clan - Giveaways
item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

B2300 T4nk:

What’s the problem with me saying vulgar language? Just because you don’t cuss doesn’t mean everybody who cusses is a delinquent you dumb shit. Please leave this community. You’re fucking annoying and hated by a lot…

I swear, just not to the point where I sound ignorant.
Also, please point out where I claim everyone who swears is a delinquent.
We all have definitions of annoying so I can understand where you’re coming from that, but hated by a lot? Bitch please.
You have little to no evidence of anyone hating me besides you, in fact I know quite a few members that I talk to quite often and are very good friends with.

Also just for future reference, calling somebody “dumb shit” just makes you sound arrogant, but hey go ahead.

Read full topic

There were clans before you posted yours and will be more to come.

Get a grip, you shouldn’t swear like that when you’re barely 13 years old.
However I was only stating that there was and will be more to come, if you took that offensively I’d hate to see how you respond to an actual offensive statement.
[/quote]1. I am 14
2. It’s none of your business if I swear or not
3. I’m cursing at you because all of your posts are full of shit.[/quote]
You say you are 13 in your pictures when you post them in the pictures thread and your profile says your are 13, therefor you must be 13 years of age. I’m simply concerned that if you are using such vulgar language at such a young age that you may grow up to be a delinquent, minus the fact you have a short temper apparently. Also, my posts are full of shit? Quite inaccurate to say the least.
Who’s posts are full of shit now?
